Soma Prayer

I have tasted the sweet drink of life; it inspires me with good thoughts and glorious expansiveness. Sing soma drinker. When the sacrifice is good, Gods and human drink together and sing prayers one to another.

Author: Rig-Veda Book 7:23-24 translation by Ellison Banks Findly.

Sources: Prayer a History Philip Zaleski, Carol Zaleski
